name: octra-backend
author: Julian Pömp, Christoph Draxler; Institut für Phonetik und Sprachverarbeitung, LMU München

scripts.build:api: npm run build:libs && nx build api --generatePackageJson -c development && node apps/api/src/app.prepare.js
scripts.build:api:prod: npm run build:libs && nx build api --generatePackageJson --prod && node apps/api/src/app.prepare.js
scripts.start:api: npm run build:api && nx serve api
scripts.package:api:prod: ./package.sh api node16-macos-x64 && ./package.sh api node16-linux-x64 && ./package.sh api node16-win-x64
scripts.release:api:prod: npm run build:api:prod && npm run package:api:prod
scripts.release:api:prod:linux: npm run build:api:prod && npm run package:api:prod:linux
scripts.release:api:prod:mac: npm run build:api:prod && npm run package:api:prod:mac
scripts.build:cli: nx build server-side && nx build cli --generatePackageJson && tsc -p apps/cli/tsconfig.assets.json && cp -rf dist/out-tsc/apps/cli/src/ dist/apps/cli/ && rm -rf node_modules/@octra && mkdir node_modules/@octra && cp -rf ./dist/libs/server-side ./node_modules/@octra/server-side && cp -rf ./dist/libs/api-types ./node_modules/@octra/api-types
scripts.build:cli:prod: npm run build:libs &&  nx build cli --prod --generatePackageJson && tsc -p apps/cli/tsconfig.assets.prod.json && cp -rf dist/out-tsc/apps/cli/src/ dist/apps/cli/ && rm -rf node_modules/@octra && mkdir node_modules/@octra && cp -rf ./dist/libs/server-side ./node_modules/@octra/server-side && cp -rf ./dist/libs/api-types ./node_modules/@octra/api-types
scripts.build:libs: nx build server-side && nx build api-types && nx build ngx-octra-api
scripts.build:extern: npm run build:libs && rm -rf extern && cp -rf dist/libs extern
scripts.build:models: rm -rf dist/api-models && ~/openapi-generator-cli generate -i dist/apps/api/swagger-spec.json -g typescript -o dist/api-models --skip-validate-spec --global-property skipFormModel=false --additional-properties=modelPropertyNaming=original && rm -rf libs/api-types/src/lib/models && mv -f dist/api-models/models libs/api-types/src/lib/
scripts.watch:libs: nx build ngx-octra-api --prod --watch & nx build octra-db --watch
scripts.package:cli:prod: ./package.sh cli node16-macos-x64 && ./package.sh cli node16-linux-x64 && ./package.sh cli node16-win-x64
scripts.release:cli:prod: npm run build:cli:prod && npm run package:cli:prod && npm run release:cli:after
scripts.release:cli:prod:mac: npm run build:cli:prod && ./package.sh cli node16-macos-x64 && npm run release:cli:after
scripts.release:cli:prod:linux: npm run build:cli:prod && ./package.sh cli node16-linux-x64 && npm run release:cli:after
